long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An AI assistant based on Azure OpenAI. You should have an Azure OpenAI account and key already.

Support "summarize", "translate", "Ask" features. 

Supported language list:
- English
- Chinese
- French
- German
- Italian
- Japanese
- Portuguese
- Russian
- Spanish

Support draggable and resizeable
